com.busit

Interface ConnectorHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Connector

    public interface ConnectorHelper

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String config(String key)
      Returns the value of the connector config parameter for the provided key.
      String id()
      Returns a unique instance identifier.
      Interface input(String key)
      Returns the input interface that matches the provided key (not name).
      String locale()
      Returns the end user's prefered language.
      void notifyOwner(String message, Map<String,Object> data)
      Reports errors or warnings to the connector owner.
      void notifyUser(String message)
      Reports errors or warnings to the end user.
      Interface output(String key)
      Returns the output interface that matches the provided key (not name).

    • Method Detail

      • notifyOwner

        void notifyOwner(String message,
               Map<String,Object> data)
        Reports errors or warnings to the connector owner.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to report to the user (consider the current locale())
        data - any additionnal stuff that might help troubleshooting

      • notifyUser

        void notifyUser(String message)
        Reports errors or warnings to the end user.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to report to the user (consider the current locale())

      • config

        String config(String key)
        Returns the value of the connector config parameter for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        key - the config key to retrieve
        Returns:
        the associated value or null if the key does not exist

      • output

        Interface output(String key)
        Returns the output interface that matches the provided key (not name).
        Parameters:
        key - the output interface key
        Returns:
        the matching interface or null if the key does not exist

      • input

        Interface input(String key)
        Returns the input interface that matches the provided key (not name).
        Parameters:
        key - the input interface key
        Returns:
        the matching interface or null if the key does not exist

      • locale

        String locale()
        Returns the end user's prefered language.
        Returns:
        the 2 letters ISO639-1 language code
        Note:
        See: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes

      • id

        String id()
        Returns a unique instance identifier. The instance identifier will always be the same fo the same user instance of the connector. No different instances of any connector will ever have the same identifier.
